articles.author: Kierra  Frazier
articles.title: After Swiss Alps New Year's Eve bar fire, a look at some of America's worst nightclub and bar fires - CBS News
articles.description: A look at bar and nightclub fires in the United States with significant death tolls and similar risks that led to the tragedies.
articles.content:
A blaze at a packed bar in the Swiss Alps during New Year's Eve celebrations killed about 40 people and injured 115 others, many of them seriously.

articles.content:
